experiences.title: Financial Software Associate
experiences.description: Helping solve Wall Street's most challenging problems through custom software solutions. Working with investment banks and financial institutions to deliver technology that transforms complex workflows into streamlined, efficient systems.

experiences.title: Student Software Engineer
experiences.company: University of Florida, Clinical & Translational Science Institute (CTSI)
experiences.description: Contributed to developing software solutions for the 1Florida Alzheimer's Disease Research Center (ADRC) group. Designed systems for seamless data sharing and integration across multiple universities. Developed Python scripts to automate clinical report generation and created tools for REDCap database integration.

experiences.title: Financial Software Associate Intern
experiences.description: Developed an internal BA user tool for a major investment bank featuring React.js interface, Java Spring Boot backend, and MongoDB database. The tool streamlined workflows and automated key processes, significantly improving team productivity.

experiences.title: Senior Android Developer
experiences.description: Led app-wide UI reforms implementing modern design while transitioning to MVVM architecture. Developed an augmented reality camera module using DeepAR with real-time face tracking, background segmentation, and customizable filters.

experiences.title: Full Stack Engineer
experiences.description: As a founding member of the technology team, developed and scaled various systems including a spam control system using OpenCV, RESTful web services with Python, and managed cloud platforms (AWS, DigitalOcean). Oversaw Android app lifecycle and introduced MVP and Observer design patterns.
